name: Deep Sleep Explorer
description:
DEEP SLEEP EXPLORER

-Deep Sleep Explorer is a game made for the Ludum Dare 48 -

DISCLAIMER : Use the web version at your own risks, it might be less stable than the downloadable Windows version. If you can, download the Windows version.

Welcome to our brand new experimental product, Deep Sleep Explorer. Download it, launch it, and explore your dreams... Dive deeper and deeper in this weird realm... Who knows what you might find down there...

Going deep

You will be exploring your dreams in separated depth layers. Because of the instability of the dream realm, you need to be quick while exploring. And be careful, if you do too much errors, you might break the product's connexion to your dreams.

Going DEEPER

Go as far as you can and explore as much as you want! But be wary, the deeper you go, the more unstable it is. You might encounter weird things in the deepest dream layers.

Gamification

Because here at Teagher Studio, we care about our customers, we gamified your dreams! Enjoy fun and quirky games while you are out there exploring what’s happening in your head.

People are already gamifying everything, so why not gamify your dreams aswell!

It's just a dream!

No cute looking characters were harmed during the making of this product. This is just a dream. Deep Sleep Explorer is a vegan-certified product.

Easy controls

Just use your Mouse to interact with the game. Move it, click, drag, throw, and so on! No need to remember a complicated key scheme. You can also press Escape to open the pause menu.

WIRELESS VERSION! NO MORE SILLY LOOKING HEADSET!

Woaw !! Enjoy the new Deep Sleep Explorer : Wireless edition! NO MORE WIRES, MORE FREEDOM, YAY! Just launch it from your computer, and boom! IT WORKS!

DIVE IN YOUR DEEPEST DREAMS CREDITS

Developer / VFX / UI / Audio : Thomas Lebrun (Raivk)

2D Artist : Léa Pequignot (Silveria)

Main Developer / UI : Anatole Chaumont (CharlieTU)

Developer : Jean-Christophe Joubier (eFrag)
